data

Types

DelimiterStrategy = enum
  EnableDelimiter, DisableDelimiter, ConcatenateSymbol, TreatAsSymbolStart
Source   Edit   
PhraseContext = object
  case sensitivity*: PhraseSensitivity
  of Freeform, NewlineSensitive:
    nil
  of IndentSensitive:
    minIndent*: int
Source   Edit   
PhraseSensitivity = enum
  Freeform, NewlineSensitive, IndentSensitive
Source   Edit   
RotOptions = object
  colon*: SpecialCharacterStrategy
  pipe*: SpecialCharacterStrategy
  bracket*: SpecialCharacterStrategy
  comment*: SpecialCharacterStrategy
  inlineSpace*, newline*: DelimiterStrategy
Source   Edit   
RotParseError = object of CatchableError
  filename*: string
  line*, column*: int
  simpleMessage*: string
Source   Edit   
RotParser = object
  options*: RotOptions
  done*: bool
  vein*: Vein
  pos*, previousPos: int
  filename*: string
  line*, column*: int
  current*: char
  recordLineIndent*: bool
  currentLineIndent*: int
Source   Edit   
SpecialCharacterStrategy = enum
  EnableFeature, DisableFeature, TreatAsSymbol
Source   Edit   
TermStartKind = enum
  Invalid, QuotedText, QuotedSymbol, EnclosedPhraseOrUnit, EnclosedBlock,
  EnclosedPhraseBlock, UnquotedSymbol
Source   Edit
